articles.title: COVID-19 | SAHPRA approves Pfizer vaccine for minors - eNCA
articles.description: The South African Health Products Regulatory Authority has approved the use of the Pfizer vaccine for children over the age of 12.
articles.content:
SAHPRA says the decision was based on a review of updated safety and efficacy information.
Pfizer is the first COVID-19 vaccine approved for minors in the country.
